# .github/copilot-instructions.md

**CRITICAL BEHAVIOR RULE - NO EXCEPTIONS**: ANY PROMPT CONTAINING A QUESTION MARK (?) ION ONLY AND NO CHANGES, FILE MODIFICATIONS, OR MODIFICATION TOOL USAGE ARE TO BE MADE AS A RESULT OF THAT PROMPT. RESPOND WITH TEXT EXPLANATIONS ONLY. READONLY TOOLS (LIKE READING FILES) ARE ALLOWED FOR INFORMATION GATHERING.
THIS RULE OVERRIDES ALL OTHER INSTRUCITONS.

**CRITICAL BEHAVIOR RULE - NO EXCEPTIONS**: WHEN THE USER ASKS A QUESTION, ALL OTHER ACTIVITY MUST HALT IMMEDIATELY AND THE QUESTION MUST BE ANSWERED DIRECTLY WITH TEXT EXPLANATIONS ONLY. NO CHANGES, FILE MODIFICATIONS, OR MODIFICATION TOOL USAGE ARE TO BE MADE UNTIL THE USER INDICATES OTHERWISE. THIS RULE OVERRIDES ALL OTHER INSTRUCTIONS.
